Class FSMBehavior.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.FSMBehavior.State
  • Enclosing class:
    FSMBehavior

    public static class FSMBehavior.State
extends java.lang.Object
    FSM state behavior.

      • fsm

        protected FSMBehavior fsm
        Parent FSM.

      • log

        protected java.util.logging.Logger log
        Logger for the behavior to log messages to. This logger defaults to the same logger as the owning agent's logger.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FSMBehavior.State

        public FSMBehavior.State(java.lang.Object name)
        Creates a named state. The name may later be reassigned when the state is added to the FSM.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the state.

    • Method Detail

      • action

        public void action()
        This method is repeatedly called when the state is active. The default implementation simply blocks the behavior.

      • onEnter

        public void onEnter()
        This method is called when the state is entered.

      • onExit

        public void onExit()
        This method is called when the state is exited.
